title: US states shrimp vessel inspection leads to drug, firearm arrest
excerpt: An inspection of skimmers on a commercial shrimp vessel led Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries officers to arrest a man for alleged possession of drugs, drug paraphernalia and unregistered weapons

title: Indonesia intercepts massive illegal fishing operations worth $12m in losses
excerpt: Indonesia has seized a Philippine-flagged vessel in its largest illegal fishing bust in a decade

title: US sushi restaurant owner faces deportation after being held by immigration officers for months
excerpt: 'This administration has prioritized arbitrary quotas instead of a humane process of dealing with illegal immigration' -- Arizona senator Ruben Gallego

title: Perus IUU deterrent to be tested again as Chinese fleet approaches
excerpt: About 250 Chinese vessels have reappeared off the Peruvian coast as Peru prepares to resume the jumbo flying squid season on Aug. 25 following a nearly two-month ban

title: US state cracks down on early shrimp harvesters, seizes 1,290 lbs in a week
excerpt: Enforcement agents with Louisiana's Department of Wildlife and Fisheries issued citations to multiple commercial fishermen earlier this month for getting ahead of the season opener on Monday

title: Trumps order to reopen protected Pacific waters faces scrutiny over presidential authority, process
excerpt: The case tests whether a president can remove protections from a national monument and whether such changes can be made without formal rulemaking

title: Bering Sea fleet highly compliant with fishing, safety regs, says US Coast Guard captain
excerpt: 'These are vast patches of water. The maritime industry is an extension of the eyes and ears of US interests' -- Jim O'Mara, US Coast Guard

title: Illegal lobster fishing problem grows worse in Canada
excerpt: 'The current minister certainly isn't responsible for what happened in the past. But the onus is on her now to take action' -- Colin Sproul, United Fisheries Conservation Alliance
